quoteFirst: “Next comes Belford again. You remember that he entered the study at a point between three and
quoteLast: . On his way there from the upper part of the house he passed Digby-Coates’s room and ‘saw Sir Arthur by the window.’ Since he went straight to the study, the time at which he passed Digby-Coates’s door cannot have been earlier than 11.03.
title: The rasp
author: MacDonald, Philip, 1901?-1980
